TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDataAdapter

summary.span: 允许对象实现 DataAdapter，并且表示一组用于填充和更新 及数据源的方法以及与映射操作有关的属性。

span.span: Allows an object to implement a DataAdapter, and represents a set of methods and mapping action-related properties that are used to fill and update a and update a data source.

summary.span: 实例针对作为（或类似于）具有文字命令（如 Transact-SQL）的关系数据库的数据源，而 实例可使用任何类型的数据源。

span.span: instances are for data sources that are (or resemble) relational databases with textual commands (like Transact-SQL), while instances could can use any type of data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口，用于实现 DataAdapter 类，表示数据源之间的桥梁的继承类和一个。The interface allows an inheriting class to implement a DataAdapter class, which represents the bridge between a data source and a . 关于 DataAdapter 类的详细信息，请参阅[填充数据集从 DataAdapter](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/populating-a-dataset-from-a-dataadapter.md)。For more information about DataAdapter classes, see [Populating a DataSet from a DataAdapter](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/populating-a-dataset-from-a-dataadapter.md). 应用程序不会创建的实例接口直接，但实现继承的类的实例。An application does not create an instance of the interface directly, but implements an instance of a class that inherits . 继承的类必须实现继承的成员，且通常会定义其他成员来添加特定于提供程序的功能。Classes that inherit must implement the inherited members, and they typically define additional members to add provider-specific functionality. 例如，接口定义采用方法作为参数。For example, the interface defines a method that takes a as a parameter. 依次类继承方法，还定义了两个重载的将 ADO 记录集对象作为参数的方法。In turn, the class inherits the method and also defines two additional overloads of the method that take an ADO Recordset object as a parameter. ## Examples 下面的示例使用派生的类中， ， ，和以从数据库选择记录。The following example uses the derived classes, , , and , to select records from a database. 已填充然后返回。The filled is then returned. 若要执行此操作，该方法传递一个已初始化，连接字符串和是 TRANSACT-SQL SELECT 语句的查询字符串。To do this, the method is passed an initialized , a connection string, and a query string that is a Transact-SQL SELECT statement. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

para.span: 若要将升级.NET Framework 数据提供程序之间的一致性，命名为窗体中的继承类DataAdapter 其中是提供给特定的.NET Framework 数据提供程序命名空间中的所有类的统一前缀。

span.span: To promote consistency among .NET Framework data providers, name the inheriting class in the form DataAdapter where is the uniform prefix given to all classes in a specific .NET Framework data provider namespace.

para.span: 例如，的前缀类中命名空间。

span.span: For example, is the prefix of the class in the namespace.

para.span: 继承自接口，则应实现以下构造函数：

span.span: When you inherit from the interface, you should implement the following constructors:
Item
Description
PrvDataAdapter()

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 Fill(class System.Data.DataSet dataSet) cil managed

param.name: dataSet
param.span: 要用记录和架构（如果必要）填充的 。

span.span: A to fill with records and, if necessary, schema.

summary.span: 添加或更新 中的行以匹配使用 名称的数据源中的行，并创建一个名为“Table”的 。

span.span: Adds or updates rows in the to match those in the data source using the name, and creates a named "Table".

returns.span: 已在 中成功添加或刷新的行数。

span.span: The number of rows successfully added to or refreshed in the .

returns.span: 这不包括受不返回行的语句影响的行。

span.span: This does not include rows affected by statements that do not return rows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用指定由关联的 SELECT 语句的数据源检索行属性。 retrieves rows from the data source using the SELECT statement specified by an associated property. 与 SELECT 语句关联的连接对象必须是有效的但它不需要打开。The connection object associated with the SELECT statement must be valid, but it does not need to be open. 如果连接已关闭之前是调用，它是打开以检索数据，然后关闭。If the connection is closed before is called, it is opened to retrieve data, then closed. 如果连接已打开之前是调用，它保持打开状态。If the connection is open before is called, it remains open. 然后，操作将行添加到目标中的对象，则创建对象如果它们尚不存在。The operation then adds the rows to destination objects in the , creating the objects if they do not already exist. 创建时对象，操作通常只创建列名称元数据。When creating objects, the operation usually creates only column name metadata. 但是，如果属性设置为`AddWithKey`，还会创建相应的主键约束。However, if the property is set to `AddWithKey`, appropriate primary keys and constraints are also created. 如果 `SelectCommand` 返回 OUTER JOIN 的结果，则 `DataAdapter` 不会为生成的 设置 值。If the `SelectCommand` returns the results of an OUTER JOIN, the `DataAdapter` does not set a value for the resulting . 必须显式定义为主键，以确保正确解析重复行。You must explicitly define the primary key to ensure that duplicate rows are resolved correctly. 有关详细信息，请参阅[定义主键](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/defining-primary-keys.md)。For more information, see [Defining Primary Keys](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/defining-primary-keys.md). 如果填充时遇到重复的列，它将生成的连续列，请使用模式"columnname1"、"columnname2"、"columnname3"等名称。If the encounters duplicate columns while populating a , it generates names for the successive columns, using the pattern "columnname1", "columnname2", "columnname3", and so on. 如果传入的数据包含未命名的列，它们都将置于根据模式"Column1"、"Column2"等。If the incoming data contains unnamed columns, they are put in the according to the pattern "Column1", "Column2", and so on. 当多个结果集添加到，每个结果集放在单独的表。When multiple result sets are added to the , each result set is put in a separate table. 其他结果集分别名为通过将整数值追加到指定的表名 （例如，"表"、"Table1"、"Table2"等）。Additional result sets are named by appending integral values to the specified table name (for example, "Table", "Table1", "Table2", and so on). 使用列和表名称以确保不会发生与这些命名模式的冲突时，应用程序应小心。Applications should use caution when using column and table names to ensure that conflicts with these naming patterns do not occur. 当用于填充 SELECT 语句返回多个结果，如一批 SQL 语句中，如果其中一个结果包含错误，所有后续结果被跳过且未添加到。When the SELECT statement that is used to populate the returns multiple results, such as a batch SQL statement, if one of the results contains an error, all successive results are skipped and not added to the . 可以使用方法上多次相同。You can use the method multiple times on the same . 如果存在主键，传入行与已存在的匹配行合并。If a primary key exists, incoming rows are merged with matching rows that already exist. 如果主键不存在，将传入的行追加到。If no primary key exists, incoming rows are appended to the . > [!NOTE] > 处理返回多个结果的实现的批处理 SQL 语句时和对于.NET Framework 数据提供程序检索架构信息只为第一个结果。When handling batch SQL statements that return multiple results, the implementation of and for a .NET Framework data provider retrieves schema information for only the first result.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Data.DataTable[] FillSchema (System.Data.DataSet dataSet, System.Data.SchemaType schemaType);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Data.DataTable[] FillSchema(class System.Data.DataSet dataSet, valuetype System.Data.SchemaType schemaType) cil managed
public: cli::array <System::Data::DataTable ^> ^ FillSchema(System::Data::DataSet ^ dataSet, System::Data::SchemaType schemaType);
abstract member FillSchema : System.Data.DataSet * System.Data.SchemaType -> System.Data.DataTable[]

param.name: dataSet
param.span: 要用数据源中的架构填充的 。

span.span: The to be filled with the schema from the data source.
One of the values.

summary.span: 将名为“Table”的 添加到指定的 ，并根据指定的 配置架构以匹配数据源中的架构。

span.span: Adds a named "Table" to the specified and configures the schema to match that in the data source based on the specified .

returns.span: 对象的数组，这些对象包含从数据源返回的架构信息。

span.span: An array of objects that contain schema information returned from the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从使用数据源中检索架构。The method retrieves the schema from the data source using the . 与关联的连接对象必须有效，但它不需要打开。The connection object associated with the must be valid, but it does not need to be open. 如果连接已关闭之前是调用，它是打开以检索数据，然后关闭。If the connection is closed before is called, it is opened to retrieve data, then closed. 如果连接已打开之前是调用，它保持打开状态。If the connection is open before is called, it remains open. 一个操作将添加到目标。A operation adds a to the destination . 然后将添加到列的并配置以下时它们的数据源中存在的属性：It then adds columns to the of the and configures the following properties if they exist at the data source: - - 。. 必须设置和单独。You must set and separately. - - - 此外可以配置和属性根据以下规则： also configures the and properties according to the following rules: - 如果返回一个或多个主键列，那么，将其用作主键列。If one or more primary key columns are returned by the , they are used as the primary key columns for the . - 如果返回没有主键列但唯一列，不可为 null 的唯一的所有列是否为主键使用的唯一列。If no primary key columns are returned but unique columns are, the unique columns are used as the primary key if all the unique columns are non-nullable. 如果任何列都可以为 null，添加到，但未设置属性。If any of the columns are nullable, a is added to the , but the property is not set. - 如果返回主键列和唯一列，主键列用作主键列。If both primary key columns and unique columns are returned, the primary key columns are used as the primary key columns for the . 请注意主键和唯一约束添加到根据以前的规则，但其他约束类型不会添加。Note that primary keys and unique constraints are added to the according to the previous rules, but other constraint types are not added. 如果一个唯一聚集索引定义的一列或 SQL Server 表中的列，并且对一组单独的列，定义主键约束，则将返回的列的聚集索引中的名称。If a unique clustered index is defined on a column or columns in a SQL Server table and the primary key constraint is defined on a separate set of columns, then the names of the columns in the clustered index will be returned. 若要返回的名称或主键列的名称，使用指定的主键索引名称的 SELECT 语句中的查询提示。To return the name or names of the primary key columns, use a query hint with the SELECT statement that specifies the name of the primary key index. 有关如何指定查询提示的详细信息，请参阅[查询提示 (TRANSACT-SQL)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms181714.aspx)。For more information about how to specify query hints, see [Query Hint (Transact-SQL)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms181714.aspx). 如果填充时遇到重复的列，它将生成的连续列，请使用模式"columnname1"、"columnname2"、"columnname3"等名称。If the encounters duplicate columns while populating a , it generates names for the successive columns, using the pattern "columnname1", "columnname2", "columnname3", and so on. 如果传入的数据包含未命名的列，它们都将置于根据模式"Column1"、"Column2"等。If the incoming data contains unnamed columns, they are put in the according to the pattern "Column1", "Column2", and so on. 当多个结果集添加到，每个结果集放在单独的表。When multiple result sets are added to the , each result set is put in a separate table. 其他结果集分别名为通过将整数值追加到指定的表名 （例如，"表"、"Table1"、"Table2"等）。Additional result sets are named by appending integral values to the specified table name (for example, "Table", "Table1", "Table2", and so on). 使用列和表名称以确保不会发生与这些命名模式的冲突时，应用程序应小心。Applications should use caution when using column and table names to ensure that conflicts with these naming patterns do not occur. 不返回任何行。 returns no rows. 使用方法以将行添加到。Use the method to add rows to a .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TableMappings As ITableMappingCollection
public: property System::Data::ITableMappingCollection ^ TableMappings { System::Data::ITableMappingCollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 指示如何将源表映射到数据集表。

span.span: Indicates how a source table is mapped to a dataset table.

value.span: 一个集合，它提供返回记录和 之间的主映射。

span.span: A collection that provides the master mapping between the returned records and the .
The default value is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅映射用于名为"Table"的源表。The uses only the mappings for the source table named "Table". 所有 SELECT、 INSERT、 DELETE 和 UPDATE 语句返回的数据必须使用来完成一致的列命名。All SELECT, INSERT, DELETE, and UPDATE statements returning data must do so using consistent column naming. 返回记录中的列名称必须是唯一的否则列具有重复名称覆盖以前的数据。The column names returned in the records must be unique, otherwise columns with duplicate names overwrite previous data. 在、 只映射到名为"Table"的源表的表将具有已对帐其更改。On , only the table mapped to the source table named "Table" will have its changes reconciled.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 Update(class System.Data.DataSet dataSet) cil managed

span.span: The used to update the data source.

summary.span: 从名为“Table”的 为指定的 中每个已插入、已更新或已删除的行调用相应的 INSERT、UPDATE 或 DELETE 语句。

span.span: Calls the respective INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements for each inserted, updated, or deleted row in the specified from a named "Table".
The number of rows successfully updated from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当应用程序调用方法，检查属性，并执行所需的 INSERT、 UPDATE 或 DELETE 语句以迭代方式对于每一行，根据中配置的索引顺序.When an application calls the method, the examines the property, and executes the required INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements iteratively for each row, based on the order of the indexes configured in the . 例如，可能会由于顺序中的行执行 DELETE 语句，INSERT 语句后, 跟和另一个 DELETE 语句， 。For example, might execute a DELETE statement, followed by an INSERT statement, and then another DELETE statement, because of the ordering of the rows in the . 请注意这些语句不会执行作为批处理过程;单独更新每个行。Be aware that these statements are not performed as a batch process; each row is updated individually. 应用程序可以调用方法如果你必须控制语句类型 （例如，插入更新之前） 的序列。An application can call the method if you must control the sequence of statement types (for example, INSERTs before UPDATEs). 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Dataadapter 更新数据源](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/updating-data-sources-with-dataadapters.md)。For more information, see [Updating Data Sources with DataAdapters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/updating-data-sources-with-dataadapters.md). 如果尚未指定 INSERT、 UPDATE 或 DELETE 语句，方法将引发异常。If INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements have not been specified, the method generates an exception. 但是，可以创建或对象来自动生成的单表更新的 SQL 语句，如果您设置`SelectCommand`的.NET Framework 数据提供程序的属性。However, you can create a or object to automatically generate SQL statements for single-table updates if you set the `SelectCommand` property of a .NET Framework data provider. 然后，由 CommandBuilder 生成未设置任何其他 SQL 语句。Then, any additional SQL statements that you do not set are generated by the CommandBuilder. 此生成逻辑要求要中存在的键列信息。This generation logic requires key column information to be present in the . 有关详细信息请参阅[使用 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md). 方法从之前执行更新的第一个映射中列出的表中检索行。The method retrieves rows from the table listed in the first mapping before performing an update. 然后更新使用的值的行属性。The then updates the row using the value of the property. 将忽略返回任何其他行。Any additional rows returned are ignored. 任何数据加载回后，则引发事件时，允许用户检查已对帐行和任何输出参数返回的命令。After any data is loaded back into the , the event is raised, allowing the user to inspect the reconciled row and any output parameters returned by the command. 已成功更新某一行后，将接受对该行更改。After a row updates successfully, the changes to that row are accepted. 当使用的执行顺序是按如下所示：When using , the order of execution is as follows: 1. 中的值移动到的参数值。The values in the are moved to the parameter values. 2. 引发 事件。The event is raised. 3. 该命令执行。The command executes. 4. 如果该命令设置为`FirstReturnedRecord`，则第一个返回结果放入。If the command is set to `FirstReturnedRecord`, then the first returned result is put in the . 5. 如果输出参数，它们都将置于。If there are output parameters, they are put in the . 6. 引发 事件。The event is raised. 7. 调用 。 is called. 与相关联的每个命令通常有一个与之关联的参数集合。Each command associated with the usually has a parameter collection associated with it. 参数映射到当前行通过`SourceColumn`并`SourceVersion`的.NET Framework 数据提供程序的属性`Parameter`类。Parameters are mapped to the current row through the `SourceColumn` and `SourceVersion` properties of a .NET Framework data provider's `Parameter` class. `SourceColumn` 是指列的以获得当前行的参数值的引用。`SourceColumn` refers to a column that the references to obtain parameter values for the current row. `SourceColumn` 在应用的任何表映射之前是指未映射的列名称。`SourceColumn` refers to the unmapped column name before any table mappings have been applied. 如果`SourceColumn`引用不存在的列，所执行的操作取决于下列任一值。If `SourceColumn` refers to a nonexistent column, the action taken depends on one of the following values. |枚举值Enumeration Value|执行操作Action Taken| |-----------------------|------------------| |`MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`|使用源列名称和中的表名如果不不存在任何映射。Use the source column names and table names in the if no mapping is present.| |`MissingMappingAction.Ignore`|一个生成。A is generated. 当显式设置映射时，缺少映射的输入参数通常被引起错误。When the mappings are explicitly set, a missing mapping for an input parameter is usually caused by an error.| |`MissingMappingAction.Error`|一个生成。A is generated.| `SourceColumn`属性还用于将映射为输出值或输入/输出参数返回到`DataSet`。The `SourceColumn` property is also used to map the value for output or input/output parameters back to the `DataSet`. 如果它所引用的列不存在，则会生成异常。An exception is generated if it refers to a nonexistent column. `SourceVersion` .NET Framework 数据提供程序的属性`Parameter`类确定是否使用`Original`， `Current`，或`Proposed`版本的列的值。The `SourceVersion` property of a .NET Framework data provider's `Parameter` class determines whether to use the `Original`, `Current`, or `Proposed` version of the column value. 此功能通常用于包括检查存在开放式并发冲突的 UPDATE 语句的 WHERE 子句中的原始值。This capability is frequently used to include original values in the WHERE clause of an UPDATE statement to check for optimistic concurrency violations. > [!NOTE] > 如果更新某行时出错，将引发异常并执行更新的已停用。If an error occurs while updating a row, an exception is thrown and execution of the update is discontinued. 若要继续更新操作不会生成异常时遇到错误，请设置属性设置为`true`然后才能调用。To continue the update operation without generating exceptions when an error is encountered, set the property to `true` before calling . 您还可能会响应中的每个行基础上的错误`RowUpdated`DataAdapter 事件。You may also respond to errors on a per-row basis within the `RowUpdated` event of a DataAdapter. 若要继续更新操作而不会生成内的异常`RowUpdated`事件中，设置的属性到。To continue the update operation without generating an exception within the `RowUpdated` event, set the property of the to . ## Examples 下面的示例使用派生的类中，到数据源。The following example uses the derived class, , to the data source. 此示例假定你已创建和一个。This example assumes that you have created an and a . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataAdapter.IDataAdapter.Update Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataAdapter.IDataAdapter.Update Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataAdapter.IDataAdapter.Update Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataAdapter.IDataAdapter.Update Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 尝试执行 INSERT、UPDATE 或 DELETE 语句，但没有记录受到影响。

span.span: An attempt to execute an INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statement resulted in zero records affected.
